column5: * Payrolls data lifts dollar  weighing on gold     * Spot gold on track to end the week up nearly 2 pct     * Palladium hits five-week high  on track for 11 pct weekly gain   (Adds comment  updates prices  adds comment  byline  NEW YORK dateline)     By Marcy Nicholson and Peter Hobson     NEW YORK/LONDON  Jan 6 Gold prices slipped on Friday from the previous day's one-month high as the dollar strengthened on a solid U.S. jobs report  while palladium was on track for its largest week
